quotes: You can control your account settings and profile information.
We collect information when you use our services, like browsing Reddit and filling out forms.
You can delete your account and information at any time, but some information may remain in our backups.
We may share information with third-party partners for various purposes.
We comply with legal requests from law enforcement.
You can adjust your privacy settings to control what others see about you.
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information.
We may update our terms and conditions from time to time.
We are committed to transparency and provide regular updates about how we handle your data.
You retain ownership of your content and can manage your permissions.

metadata.additional_notes: The terms and conditions show a moderate level of GDPR compliance, with areas for improvement in data sharing and deletion. The risk level is elevated due to the data sharing with third-party partners.
